# barOffset

**Instance Property**

The offset of one bar with respect to another.

## Declaration

```swift
var barOffset: Float { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **angle**: The angle, in radians, of the bars.
- **width**: The width of each bar.

items.description: The angle, in radians, of the bars.
